about_the_game:
【INTRODUCE】

Some people make the rules, some people utilize the rules, and all you need to do is break the rules.

The world of football is in chaos as it is ravaged by capital with match-fixing. In such an illegal football world, as a senior football manager, you need to have different means to survive.

One day, you are approached by a mysterious tycoon who wants you to form a national football team for your country to compete in the World Championship. As for the money, there's plenty of it.

However, the coaches and players of your country have been indulging in alcohol and sex for a long time, and they have no ability to fight on the field.

So you go around the country's bars, foot baths, retirement homes, and churches to dig up and build a football team made up of superheroes.

Iron-Head Man, Roller Man, Hand-of-God Man, Bite Man... One by one, seemingly old and weak players join your team. You need to master the technical characteristics of each player, flexible use of their skills, especially reasonable and bold use of your "money ability", turn the tide, to complete the impossible task, and ultimately become the world champion.

【SUPERHEROES】

  • Iron-Head Man
    With his bald head, he has scored headers to win a World Cup. However, he also lost a World Cup for heading his opponent.


  • Roller Man
    One of the most kicked thing on the pitch is the football, another is him. When fouled by an opposing player, he will roll forward four and a half times with his knees crossed, with a difficulty factor of 5.1.


  • Hand-of-God Man
    A little of the hand of God, and a little of the head of him.


  • Bite Man
    He once bit 13 people in 4 years, which makes him, without a doubt, the biggest villain in the history of world football. The shoulders of many world's famous footballers became his delicacy!

【FEATURES】

  • Anti-conventional football management. You can bribe referees, bribe players, and do whatever you want.
  • Become the mastermind behind the stadium and use all kinds of unconventional means to control the matches.
  • Create a huge and intricate dark social network.
  • Diving, malicious fouls, and make full use of players' special skills.
  • Fight with players and referees at will.
  • Use your Super Money Ability to change the rules of match, such as adding Three Point Shot.

【SYSTEM】

  • Team Management
    Find unconventional players and coaches, improve their attributes and skills to create a powerful national football team.
  • Match-fixing
    Bribe opposing players, coaches, referees, and even FA officials.
  • Match
    Pay to win, as long as you pay enough money, you can change the game rules, no matter how strange and absurd they are, such as the appearance of 2 balls, the appearance of oversized goal.
  • Social Network
    Continuously expand your social network, meet various bosses and celebrities, accumulate funds for match-fixing, and unlock special skills.
  • World Championship
    Go to international matches to play match-fixing, challenge the world's strongest teams, and help your national football team win the World Cup.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Memory 128Mb
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: This is a surrealistic football game. You will form a national football team composed of super heroes, use some unusual ways (such as match-fixing, bribing the refree), and lead them to challenge the top teams in the world to win the world championship.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
